org.jetel.util

Class TaskQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.jetel.util.TaskQueue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TaskQueue
extends java.lang.Thread
    A simple task queue Each task (actually a Runnable) is scheduled in the queue by addTask(Runnable) method Tasks are executed sequentially in single thread (the queue itself). This thread waits until the queue is non-empty. The size of the queue is limited by maxQueueLength. If it gets exceeded the thread calling addTask() is blocked until the queue shrinks
